query:
SELECT 
                SUM(CASE WHEN link_type = 'internal' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as internal,
                SUM(CASE WHEN link_type = 'external' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as external,
                SUM(CASE WHEN link_type = 'resource' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as resource
            FROM links
            WHERE job_id = ?
